job.title: General Manager Task Force
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltemgtthe hampton inn wilmingtonchristina old churchmans road newark de is ready for you to join us as a task force general managerampnbspwith the ability to apply for the full time general manager positionltemgtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltemgtif you have a passion for hospitality and want to be a part of tbc hotels a progressive exciting hotel company we think it would be incredible to hear from you are you currently an assistant general manager an operations manager or perhaps a hotel general manager looking to make a moveampnbspampnbspdo not let this task force opportunity pass you byampnbspampnbspltemgtltstronggtltpgtltpgtthe hampton inn is looking to add an exceptional leader to our teamampnbspwe are looking for a very ltstronggtltemgthands onltemgtltstronggt task force general manager to bring their talents to our hotelampnbspis this youampnbspat least one year of hotel operational experience is requiredampnbspif you have knowledge of onq or hilton experience it is a major plus it goes without saying that you must be dependable ability to work a flexible schedule and bring your smile and positive vibes with you every dayampnbspwe are going to be picky as we are looking for the right puzzle piece to add to our familyampnbspif you are trying to find a new opportunity where everyone brings next level hospitality please applyltpgt
